mehidi dewana sakakaru wana hitapu puththalama pradeshiya sabhawe manthriwaraya siddhiya sambandhayen papochcharanayak sidu kirimata awasthawa labadena lesata karanu labu illima sambandhayen prathichara dakwu mahesthrathwariya pawasa sitiye thawaduratath kalpana kara balana lesaya. 2011 warshaye manga nanguma marga idikirim yanthropakarana samagama wisin ayatha andamin amarikanu dolar 679753k waya kara konkrit athirima, miliyana 10k waya kara skawetar yanthrayak mila di ganima ema yanthrayen kaduwela korathota waththa idame pihiti kalu galak kanim katayuthu sandaha sakakaru wetha laba dima yana chodana matha mulya aparadha kottasaya wisin sakakaru adhikaranaya wetha idiripath kara thibina. 2011 anka 92,900 konkrit jetar rathayak adin intanashanal aayathanaya manga nangumata mila di ganima ru 73,907,243.55 gewa athi ihatha aayathanaya mema rathayata 36,506,995.35 asthamenthu kara ema mudala rupiyal 37.370,248.00 wadipura gewa manganaguma banku ginumen laba gena mudal akramikatha sidu kirima ha shri lanka waraya adhikariye denjaras kago ahirimak sambandhayen rupiyal 1,096,000 manga nanguma marga idikirima shri lanka warayata nogewima yana siddhi sambandhawa da mulya aparadha kottasaya hitapu janapathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage riyaduru kaptan thissa wimalasena yana aya ha puththalama pradeshiya sabha hitapu manthri em.lal priyantha piris yana aya athadanguwata ganimen anathuruwa adhikaranayata idiripath kirimen anathuruwa melesa rakshitha bandhanagaragatha kara atha.
